## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass (`pytest -v` / `pnpm test`)
- [ ] Types check (`mypy` / `pnpm type-check`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`ruff check` / `pnpm lint`)
- [ ] Conventional commit message
- [ ] No secrets committed
